title: Using the Remainder Theorem
text: To find the remainder using the Remainder Theorem, use synthetic division to divide the polynomial by $$(x-2)$$.

title: Using Synthetic Division
text: Use synthetic division to divide the polynomial by $$(x-2)$$. The quotient after dividing by $$(x-2)$$ is $$6x^3$$ + $$11x^2$$ + $$7x$$ + $$16$$ and the remainder is $$25$$.\n##figure1.gif##
